title: Vaccination Requirements
description: View the information below on the immunization against bacterial meningitis before classes at St. Edward's University.
sitename: St. Edward's University in Austin, Texas
cleaned_text: The University's focus on the health and safety of our students, faculty, staff, and guests is very important to our community. The university requires a bacterial meningitis and COVID-19 vaccine (or vaccine exemption) for every student - whether living on or off-campus. Meningitis Vaccine submission requirements: - Meningitis vaccine must be an MCV4 vaccine - The vaccine must be within the last 5 years - You may submit your documentation [here](https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/9955869b414746bd921167eba5fd4e41). - Read more about [exemption information](https://www.dshs.texas.gov/immunization-unit/texas-school-child-care-facility-immunization/texas-immunization-exemptions) Read more information about the [meningitis requirements](https://stedwards.box.com/s/amwmnmzuujolly2pneqpg0r665t6xccj) COVID-19 vaccine requirements: - Proof of COVID-19 vaccination for the primary series - We encourage up to date COVID-19 boosters - You may submit your documentation [here](https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/f96c4285b0774aaaa3626b05c4f834ba) - Read more about [exemption information](https://stedwards.app.box.com/s/xl0qcuu5e38sg9wfa5twrx0ucc08cf5l) Read more information about the [COVID requirements](https://stedwards.box.com/s/hnnmu6qxe55lhan9u8e556tertxjoc3z) Have questions or need assistance with submitting your health records? Contact the Health & Counseling Center (HCC)
